item.title: Morgana King - Everybody Loves Saturday Night - Key of C - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song Everybody Loves Saturday Night performed by Morgana King. Chords used in the song: C, G7.

item.description: Play along video for the song Everybody Loves Saturday Night performed by Morgana King. Chords used in the song: C, G7.

item.title: Louis Armstrong - What A Wonderful World - Key of F - ukeplayalongs
item.description: Play along video for the song What A Wonderful World performed by Louis Armstrong. Chords used in the song: A7, Am, Am7, B♭, C7, C♯, D7, Dm, F, F+, F♯dim7, Gm7.

item.description: Play along video for the song Heart and Soul performed by Larry Clinton. Chords used in the song: A7, Am, B7, C, C7, Dm, E7, F, G7.
